Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of cloth in linen and wool. The motif consists of large and small buds in red and pink, scattered across a white linen background.Technique: plain weave ground with thick weft stripes. Tapestry weave over double warp threads using very fine woollen yarns.Ends per inch (warp threads): 36.Picks per inch (weft threads): 40 over ground.
